00084 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00085 // Class template stResultPair
00086 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00099 template < class ObjectType >
00100 class stResultPair{
00101    public:
00105       typedef ObjectType tObject;
00106 
00116       stResultPair(tObject * obj, stDistance distance){
00117 
00118          this->Object = obj;
00119          this->JoinedObject = NULL;
00120          this->Distance = distance;
00121       }//end stResultPair
00122 
00133       stResultPair(tObject * obj, tObject * joinedobj, stDistance distance){
00134 
00135          this->Object = obj;
00136          this->JoinedObject = joinedobj;
00137          this->Distance = distance;
00138       }//end stResultPair
00139 
00144       ~stResultPair(){
00145 
00146          if (Object != NULL){
00147             delete Object;
00148          }//end if
00149          if (JoinedObject != NULL){
00150             delete JoinedObject;
00151          }
00152       }//end ~stResultPair
00153 
00157       const tObject * GetObject(){
00158          return Object;
00159       }//end GetObject
00160 
00164       const tObject * GetJoinedObject(){
00165          return JoinedObject;
00166       }//end GetObject
00167 
00171       stDistance GetDistance(){
00172          return Distance;
00173       }//end GetDistance
00174    private:
00178       tObject * Object;
00179 
00183       tObject * JoinedObject;
00184 
00188       stDistance Distance;
00189 };//end stResultPair
00190 
00191 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00192 // Class template stResult
00193 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00218 template < class ObjectType >
00219 class stResult{
00220    public:
00224       enum tQueryType{
00228          UNKNOWN = 0,
00229 
00233          RANGEQUERY = 1,
00234 
00238          KNEARESTQUERY = 2,
00239 
00243          ESTIMATEKNEARESTQUERY = 3,
00244 
00248          RINGQUERY = 4,
00249 
00253          KRINGQUERY = 5,
00254 
00258          KANDRANGEQUERY = 6,
00259 
00263          KORRANGEQUERY = 7,
00264 
00268          POINTQUERY = 8,
00269 
00273          REVERSEDRANGEQUERY = 9,
00274 
00278          KFARTHESTQUERY = 10
00279       };//end tQueryType
00280 
00284       typedef ObjectType tObject;
00285 
00289       typedef stResultPair< ObjectType > tPair;
00290 
00298       stResult(unsigned int hint = 1){
00299          // Reserve results
00300          Pairs.reserve(hint);
00301          // No info
00302          SetQueryInfo();
00303       }//end stResult
00304 
00308       virtual ~stResult();
00309 
00313       tPair & operator [] (unsigned int idx){
00314          return (*Pairs[idx]);
00315       }//end operator []
00316 
00320       unsigned int GetNumOfEntries(){
00321          return Pairs.size();
00322       }//end GetNumOfEntries
00323 
00331       void AddPair(tObject * obj, stDistance distance){
00332          unsigned int pos;
00333 
00334          pos = this->Find(distance);
00335          Pairs.insert(Pairs.begin() + pos, new tPair(obj, distance));
00336       }//end AddPair
00337 
00347       void AddJoinedPair(tObject * obj, tObject * joinedObj, stDistance distance){
00348          unsigned int pos;
00349 
00350          pos = this->Find(distance);
00351          Pairs.insert(Pairs.begin() + pos, new tPair(obj, joinedObj, distance));
00352       }//end AddJoinedPair
00353 
00357       void RemoveLast(){
00358 
00359          if (Pairs.size() > 0){
00360             if (Pairs[Pairs.size() - 1] != NULL){
00361                delete Pairs[Pairs.size() - 1];
00362             }//end if
00363             Pairs.pop_back();
00364          }//end if
00365       }//end RemoveLast
00366 
00370       void RemoveFirst(){
00371 
00372          if (Pairs.size() > 0){
00373             if (Pairs[0] != NULL){
00374                delete Pairs[0];
00375             }//end if
00376             Pairs.erase(Pairs.begin());
00377          }//end if
00378       }//end RemoveFirst
00379 
00384       stDistance GetMinimumDistance(){
00385 
00386          if (Pairs.size() > 0){
00387             return Pairs[0]->GetDistance();
00388          }else{
00389             return -1;
00390          }//end if
00391       }//end GetMinimumDistance
00392 
00397       stDistance GetMaximumDistance(){
00398 
00399          if (Pairs.size() > 0){
00400             return Pairs[Pairs.size() - 1]->GetDistance();
00401          }else{
00402             return -1;
00403          }//end if
00404       }//end GetMaximumDistance
00405 
00415       void Cut(unsigned int limit);
00416 
00426       void CutFirst(unsigned int limit);
00427 
00449       void SetQueryInfo(tObject * sample = NULL, int querytype = UNKNOWN,
00450                         stCount k = 0, stDistance radius = 0.0,
00451                         stDistance innerRadius = 0.0, bool tie = false){
00452          QueryType = querytype;
00453          K = k;
00454          Radius = radius;
00455          InnerRadius = innerRadius;
00456          Sample = sample;
00457          Tie = tie;
00458       }//end SetQueryInfo
00459 
00479       void SetQueryInfo(tObject * sample, int querytype,
00480                         stCount k, stDistance radius, bool tie){
00481          this->SetQueryInfo(sample, querytype, k, radius, 0.0, tie);
00482       }//end SetQueryInfo
00483 
00488       int GetQueryType(){
00489          return QueryType;
00490       }//end GetQueryType
00491 
00496       unsigned int GetK(){
00497          return K;
00498       }//end GetK
00499 
00504       stDistance GetRadius(){
00505          return Radius;
00506       }//end GetRadius
00507 
00511       stDistance GetInnerRadius(){
00512          return InnerRadius;
00513       }//end GetRadius
00514 
00521       tObject * GetSample(){
00522          return Sample;
00523       }//end GetSample
00524 
00531       bool GetTie(){
00532          return Tie;
00533       }//end GetTie
00534 
00541       bool IsEqual(const stResult * r1);
00542 
00549       double Precision(const stResult * r1);
00550 
00551 
00557       void Intersection(stResult * result1, stResult * result2);
00558 
00564       void Union(stResult * result1, stResult * result2);
00565 
00566    private:
00570       vector < tPair * > Pairs;
00571 
00575       int QueryType;
00576 
00581       unsigned int K;
00582 
00587       bool Tie;
00588 
00593       stDistance Radius;
00594 
00598       stDistance InnerRadius;
00599 
00603       tObject * Sample;
00604 
00612       unsigned int Find(stDistance distance);
00613       
00614 };//end stResult
